articles.title: FIFA Rejects Ukraine President Zelensky's Request To Share Message Of Peace At World Cup Final: Report - NDTV
articles.description: World Cup organiser FIFA has rejected a request from Ukraine President Volodymyr Zelensky to deliver a message of world peace ahead of the tournament's final in Qatar on Sunday, CNN reported.
articles.content:
FIFA has gone to extreme lengths to keep political messaging out of its tournament.
